channel.title: fitgreenmind TikTok
channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from fitgreenmind

item.title: DISH OF THE MONTH: Fellah köftesi 🇹🇷 What should be the next dish I should try? 😌👇 Today we have little Turkish bulgur sauce in a flavorful tomato sauce, served with yogurt… shaping them was a bit of work but overall I’m SUPER happy with th result and the
item.description: DISH OF THE MONTH: Fellah köftesi 🇹🇷 What should be the next dish I should try? 😌👇 Today we have little Turkish bulgur sauce in a flavorful tomato sauce, served with yogurt… shaping them was a bit of work but overall I’m SUPER happy with th result and the

item.title: Homemade pretzels 🥨 This is @fitgreenmom’s secret recipe for the most delicious pretzel buns… they’re so soft, fluffy and I’d say simply perfect!😌🤝 RECIPE (10 pieces, 2h prep time): -600g flour -15g salt -15g sugar Mix well and make a well in the middle.
item.description: Homemade pretzels 🥨 This is @fitgreenmom’s secret recipe for the most delicious pretzel buns… they’re so soft, fluffy and I’d say simply perfect!😌🤝 RECIPE (10 pieces, 2h prep time): -600g flour -15g salt -15g sugar Mix well and make a well in the middle.

item.title: 1 banana-banana bread for all single bananas out there! 😎🍌 RECIPE (1 mini bread): -1 ripe banana, mashed -1 Tbsp sugar -1 Tbsp milk of choice -1 Tbsp oil -1/2 Tsp baking powder -CINNAMON -6 Tbsp flour -a pinch of salt Mix well (but don’t over mix haha)

item.title: Mental health support snack: Miso-butter noodles 🍜 I got inspired by @maditaris to make snacks that don’t look fancy, might not be the healthiest but they make you feel good…😎 These noodles are EXACTLY that, so give them a try the next time you need some
item.description: Mental health support snack: Miso-butter noodles 🍜 I got inspired by @maditaris to make snacks that don’t look fancy, might not be the healthiest but they make you feel good…😎 These noodles are EXACTLY that, so give them a try the next time you need some

item.title: Warm horchata aka liquid rice pudding 🍚😍 This will be your favorite drink this winter! 😋 RECIPE (makes 1 liter, 20 min prep + soaking time) * 200 g jasmine rice * 500 ml water * 2 sticks Ceylon cinnamon Cover the rice with water and let it soak overnight.
item.description: Warm horchata aka liquid rice pudding 🍚😍 This will be your favorite drink this winter! 😋 RECIPE (makes 1 liter, 20 min prep + soaking time) * 200 g jasmine rice * 500 ml water * 2 sticks Ceylon cinnamon Cover the rice with water and let it soak overnight.

item.title: BIG THINGS are happening on November 1st…👀 🌱 (Werbung/Ad) I’ve teamed up with @moea_sneakers, a vegan, French plant-based sneaker label I’ve always loved and I've been wearing a lot, to create something cool, something REVOLUTIONARY… just stay palm.😌🫶

item.title: STAY PALM - you’re on the right side of change 🌴 (Werbung/Ad) Stay Palm, because I wanted this collab with @moea_sneakers to be a symbol for everyone who still believes in the values that matter. Veganism is under attack these days. But stay palm, we’re m

item.title: THIS IS NOT JUST A COLLAB! (Werbung/Ad) It’s about working together towards a better future, towards a plant-based revolution. 🌱 Lately, the world’s felt heavier. Like people forget about the urgency of the climate crisis… It makes me feel small. Alone. B
item.description: THIS IS NOT JUST A COLLAB! (Werbung/Ad) It’s about working together towards a better future, towards a plant-based revolution. 🌱 Lately, the world’s felt heavier. Like people forget about the urgency of the climate crisis… It makes me feel small. Alone. B
